pages.text: You maybe have realized some blocks contain transparent parts in some designs, such as doors, trapdoors, carpets, panes and daylight detectors. You can color them as you like. Simply right-click the frame or illusion block with a piece of dye to change the color of this section. The dye item $(o)will not be consumed$() in the process!

pages.title: Dyes
pages.text: However, the prerequisite for this is that the frame or illusion block has already been "filled" with a block and imitates it, and a design with transparent parts is selected. This feature is supported by frame and illusion doors, trapdoors, carpets, panes and daylight detectors.
The same approach goes for blocks that have wool-like parts, such as beds or carpets. Also, since beds are two blocks large, you can dye pillow and blanket independently.
